text: STOCKHOLM, Feb 12 Sweden, which has spurned a lockdown throughout the pandemic, registered 3,834 new coronavirus cases on Friday, Health Agency statistics showed.The country of 10 million inhabitants registered 58 new deaths, taking the total to 12,428. The deaths registered have occurred over several days and weeks.Swedens death rate per capita is several times higher than that of its Nordic neighbours, but lower than several European countries that opted for lockdowns. (Reporting by Anna Ringstrom; editing by Johannes Hellstrom)
